entry.def: If you describe something as uncanny, you mean that it is strange and difficult to explain.

example.ex: The hero, Danny, bears an uncanny resemblance to Kirk Douglas...
example.tran: 主人公丹尼与柯克·道格拉斯出奇地相像。

example.ex: I had this uncanny feeling that Alice was warning me.
example.tran: 我有一种奇怪的感觉：艾丽斯是在警告我。
